question: I have just been diagnosed with AIH and started taking pred and imuran, they seem to be working it has only been a week but doc says i could be prone to diabetes because of the pred or at least raise bloddsugar levels, i have also read that diabetes could be cause of AIH. Diabetes runs in the family, was wondering been checking daily im at 11.6 avg everyday hour after supper is this high or just because of the pred?
title: Autoimmune hep and diabetes
